text: Eduardo Cesti Vilchez (8 December 1941 - 4 December 2020) was a Peruvian actor. He was born in Lima, Peru. His career lasted between 1963 and 2011. He was best known for his roles as Rafael in Fire on the Amazon (1993) and as Conan in the telenovela La mujer de Lorenzo. Cesti died on 4 December 2020 in Lima from diabetes-related problems, just four days before his 79th birthday.Muri√≥ el recordado "Gamboa" Eduardo Cesti ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Movie actors Category:Peruvian television actors Category:Actors from Lima
